Replace.Text: 塔祠
塔祠
允许建造塔祠（+2 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值；如果所在的圣地与湖泊或者海岸单元格相邻则塔祠+3 [ICON_Faith] 信仰, + 3 [ICON_CULTURE] 文化, +2 [Icon_Amenities] 宜居度）。

Allow constructs Candi(+2 [ICON_Faith] Faith; If Holy Site is adjacent to Lake or Coast tiles, Candi receives +3 [ICON_Faith] Faith, + 3 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, +2 [Icon_Amenities] Amenity extra bonus.)
如果所在的圣地与湖泊或者海岸单元格相邻则+3 [ICON_Faith] 信仰, +3 [ICON_CULTURE] 文化, +2 [Icon_Amenities] 宜居度
If Holy Site is adjacent to Lake or Coast tiles, Candi receives +3 [ICON_Faith] Faith, + 3 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, +2 [Icon_Amenities] Amenity extra bonus.
隐修地
隐修地
允许建造隐修地（+2 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值；建成第一个隐修地时解锁人文“保护地球”的鼓舞。有隐修地的城市所有单元格+1魅力，且本城购买自然学家-50%的信仰花费）。

Allow constructs Khalwat (+2 [ICON_Faith] Faith; Unlock the boost of Civic 'Conservation' after first Khalwat was built.+1 Appeal to all tiles in city with a Khalwat and -50% cost when purchasing Naturalist in this city.)
建成第一个隐修地时解锁人文“保护地球”的鼓舞。有隐修地的城市所有单元格+1魅力，且本城购买自然学家-50%的信仰花费。
Unlock the boost of Civic 'Conservation' after first Khalwat was built.+1 Appeal to all tiles in city with a Khalwat and -50% cost when purchasing Naturalist in this city.
印度神庙
印度神庙
允许建造印度神庙（+2 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值；本城所有特色区域+3 [ICON_FOOD] 食物 +1 [ICON_FAITH] 信仰值。）。
Allow constructs Mandir (+2 [ICON_Faith] Faith; +3 [ICON_FOOD] Food and +1 [ICON_FAITH] Faith for all Speciality Districts in this city.)
本城所有特色区域+3 [ICON_FOOD] 食物 +1 [ICON_FAITH] 信仰值。
+3 [ICON_FOOD] Food and +1 [ICON_FAITH] Faith for all Speciality Districts in this city.
神道教神社
神道教神社
允许建造神道教神社（+2 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值；每个神道教神社为陆地军事单位加2战斗力（最多+10战斗力），所在城市生产出军事单位时获得相当于所花费生产力20%的信仰。）

Allow constructs Jinja (+2 [ICON_Faith] Faith; +2 [Icon_STRENGTH] Combat Strength) for all land units for each Jinja within your territory ( 10 at most). Your civilization gains [ICON_FAITH] Faith equal to 20% of the unit’s cost when a non-civilian is trained in this city.
每个神道教神社为陆地军事单位加2战斗力（最多+10战斗力），所在城市生产出军事单位时获得相当于所花费生产力20%的信仰。

+2 [Icon_STRENGTH] Combat Strength) for all land units for each Jinja within your territory ( 10 at most). Your civilization gains [ICON_FAITH] Faith equal to 20% of the unit’s cost when a non-civilian is trained in this city.
道观
道观
允许建造道观（+2 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值；每个区域加2对应伟人点（剧院是大作家、大艺术家和大音乐家），如果区域内已有建筑，每个区域再加2对应伟人点。）。

Allow constructs Daoguan (+2 [ICON_Faith] Faith; +2 extra Great Person Points for each Districts (Great Writer points, Great Musician Points and Great Artists Points for Theatre). +2 extra Great Person Points if Districts have builidings within.)
每个区域加2对应伟人点（剧院是大作家、大艺术家和大音乐家），如果区域内已有建筑，每个区域再加2对应伟人点。
+2 extra Great Person Points for each Districts (Great Writer points, Great Musician Points and Great Artists Points for Theatre). +2 extra Great Person Points if Districts have builidings within.
姆巴里
姆巴里
允许建造姆巴里（+2 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值 +6 [ICON_GOLD] 金币；+1商路容量，本城 [ICON_GOLD] 金币产出+10%.)
Allow constructs Jinja (+2 [ICON_Faith] Faith +6 [ICON_GOLD] Gold;+1 Trade Route Capacity and +10% [ICON_GOLD] Gold in this city.)
+1商路容量，本城 [ICON_GOLD] 金币产出+10%.
+1 Trade Route Capacity and +10% [ICON_GOLD] Gold in this city.
羽蛇神庙
羽蛇神庙
允许建造羽蛇神庙（+2 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值；每个羽蛇神庙为尤里卡+1% [ICON_SCIENCE] 科技值，为鼓舞+1% [ICON_CULTURE] 文化值，均最多增加10%。)
Allow constructs Tzacualli (+2 [ICON_Faith] Faith;Each Tzacualli provides extra 1% [ICON_SCIENCE] Science for Eruka and 1% [ICON_CULTURE] Culture for Boost with 10% as the upper bound.)
每个羽蛇神庙为尤里卡+1%科技值，为鼓舞+1%文化值，均最多增加10%。
Each Tzacualli provides extra 1% [ICON_SCIENCE] Science for Eruka and 1% [ICON_CULTURE] Culture for Boost with 10% as the upper bound.
柱廊神庙
柱廊神庙
允许建造柱廊神庙（+2 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值；每个柱廊神庙建成后奖励1名 [ICON_Envoy] 使者。)
Allow constructs Peripteros (+2 [ICON_Faith] Faith;Each Peripteros awards 1 [ICON_Envoy] Envoy when completed.)
每个柱廊神庙建成后奖励1名 [ICON_Envoy] 使者。
Each Peripteros awards 1 [ICON_Envoy] Envoy when completed.
东正教堂
东正教堂
允许建造东正教堂（+2 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值；可放置1个 [ICON_GreatWork_Relic] 遗物。此城市遗物产出的 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值和 [ICON_Tourism] 旅游业绩增加100%)

Allow constructs Sobor (+2 [ICON_Faith] Faith; 1 slot for [ICON_GreatWork_Relic] Relics. [ICON_GreatWork_Relic] Relics in this city have 100% more yield of both [ICON_Faith] Faith and [ICON_Tourism] Tourism.)
可放置1个 [ICON_GreatWork_Relic] 遗物。此城市遗物产出的 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值和 [ICON_Tourism] 旅游业绩增加100%。
1 slot for [ICON_GreatWork_Relic] Relics. [ICON_GreatWork_Relic] Relics in this city have 100% more yield of both [ICON_Faith] Faith and [ICON_Tourism] Tourism.
